content.description: Vincent van Gogh, Dutch painter working in France, The Exercise Yard, or The Convict Prison, 1890Pushkin Museum, Moscow, Russia/Bridgeman Images
content.question: Van Gogh’s choice of subject matter in this painting provides most effective evidence for which of the following?

choices.label: Neoclassical artists’ desire to convey an idealized form of patriotism
Realist artists’ concern with calling attention to social issues
Romantic artists’ attempts to break from rational constraints
Baroque artists’ efforts to convey intense religious feeling

content.answer: Realist artists’ concern with calling attention to social issues

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
